description: Strike up a fire and get cooking even in the rain. Whittle a few shavings from the tinder. Shower them with high temperature sparks from the FireSteel. Spear your hotdog on the FireFork and roast to crisp perfection.Tinder-on-a-Rope is high resin wood that's easy to light, slow-burning, waterproof and has no chemical additives.FireSteel Scout Bio is a magnesium alloy and striker is stainless steel, both with sugarcane- and wood fibre-based HDPE handle.FireFork mounts on almost any stick and includes a bio-plastic safety cap.
name: Light My Fire Firelighting Kit BIO-Plastic
